name: The God's Cave
description:
Find more information about the project and myself here: https://thegodscave.wordpress.com

You died what seems like years ago

You wake up and find yourself in a dark, damp cave with nothing but a mysterious voice to guide you

Can you find your way out of The God's Cave?

This is a short 5 minute puzzle game about freeing yourself and others from 'The God's Cave', a place where a chosen few go after they die as a test to see if they have what it takes to become a God. The puzzle seems half complete already, leaving you to finish the rest.
